item.title: 🍽 HUB1 - Sprout Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB1 - Sprout Lunch Menu: | Vores daglige, friske og næringsrige måltidssalat med frit valg mellem vegetabilsk eller animalsk protein. | Our daily fresh and nutritious meal salad with a free choice of either plant-based or animal protein. |

item.title: 🍽 HUB1 - Homebound Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB1 - Homebound Lunch Menu: | Kartoffel/porre suppe med rodfrugt chips, sprøde kerner og friske urter | Potato and leeks soup with vegetable chips, crispy seeds and fresh herbs. |

item.title: 🍽 HUB1 - Globetrotter Lunch Menu
item.description:
🍽 HUB1 - Globetrotter Lunch Menu: |
VEGETAR: Thai green curry with tofu and coconut milk. With lots of greens and herbs. | Served with rice |

item.title: 🍽 HUB3 - Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB3 - Lunch Menu: | Fuldkornspasta med rød pesto, lavet på solmodne tomater, røde peberfrugter, parmesan og mandler. Serveret med stegte portobello svampe, valnøddecrumble, parmesan og aromatisk salvie. | Dagens kage | Saftig solbærkage smagt til med tonkabønne og pisket creme fraiche | Whole grain pasta with red pesto, made with sun-ripened tomatoes, red peppers, parmesan and almonds. Served with roasted portobello mushrooms, walnut crumble, parmesan and aromatic sage. | Cake of the day | Blackcurrant cake flavored with tonka bean and whipped cream fraice |

item.title: 🍽 HUB2 - Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB2 - Lunch Menu: | One Pot fuldkornspasta med grøntsager og cremet tomatsauce. | En smagfuld og mættende vegetarret med fuldkornspasta, sauterede grøntsager, stegt hallumi og en fløjlsblød tomatsauce. Alt tilberedt i én gryde for maksimalt smag. En ret fyldt med farver, fibre og kærlighed. Hertil chilisauce. | Dagens dessert: | Klassisk citronfromage | One Pot whole wheat pasta with vegetables and creamy tomato sauce. | A flavorful and filling vegetarian dish with whole grain pasta, sautéed vegetables, fried halloumi and a velvety tomato sauce. All cooked in one pot for maximum flavor. A dish full of colors, fibers and love. Served with chili sauce a part. | Cake of the day: Classic lemon cheese |

item.title: 🍽 HUB1 – Kays - Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB1 – Kays - Lunch Menu: | Massaman karry | Mildt krydret thai karry serveret med ris. | Massaman curry | Mild spicy thai curry, served with rice. |
